title: Cucumber Tomato Avocado Salad
directions: Place chopped tomatoes, sliced cucumber, sliced red onion, diced avocado, and chopped cilantro into a large salad bowl.
Drizzle with 2 Tbsp olive oil and 2 Tbsp lemon juice. Toss gently to combine. Just before serving, toss with 1 tsp sea salt and ⅛ tsp black pepper.
ingredients: 2 Tbsp extra virgin olive oil or sunflower oil
1 tsp sea salt or 3/4 tsp table salt
*Note: if you aren’t keen on cilantro, fresh dill is a good substitute
